name: In Memory
description: Step into the memories of a prisoner of war and let the story unfold.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1200 MB available space
